Author: kidosneh
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITHEUM [BTH] | The Revolutionary Digital Cash For Everyone
Body: WEBSITE  |   FACEBOOK   |   TWITTER   |   TELEGRAM WHITEPAPER  What is BITHEUM BITHEUM is a fully decentralized peer-to-peer digital cash, stored and transferred electronically, and powered by computers around the world for a fast, secured and private transactions. BITHEUM is not controlled by anyone or governments, banks or institution. BITHEUM is a Digital Cash You Can Spend Anywhere; Anyone can use BITHEUM to make instant, private payments online or in-store using our secure open-source platform which will be hosted by thousands of users around the world. BITHEUM is aiming to make cryptocurrency accessible to all just as fiat is. What are the unique features of BITHEUM Full Decentralization: BITHEUM is a fully peer-to-peer cryptocurrency, secure open-source platform hosted by thousands of cloud computers and users around the world. X11 Algorithm: x11 is a widely used hashing algorithm, which takes a different approach, known as algorithm chaining. x11 consists of all 11 SHA3 contestants[13], each hash is calculated then submitted to the next algorithm in the chain. Zero Transaction Fees: Bitheum is a cryptocurrency that offers an amazingly fast transaction with zero cost no matter the weight/size, time and location of the transaction. Smart Staking feature: BITHEUM offers a great way for users to earn passive income without much hassle, or need for having their wallets open all times, buying any costly hardware or ASICS. The smart staking program is designed to encourage long term holding and a way to stabilize the market value of the BITHEUM coins. More detailed information about the smart staking feature will be released both on the social media and whitepaper. Completely Anonymous: Sending payments/money from one place to another without letting anyone know or without paying the huge transaction fees as with most traditional payment systems, is just getting easier with BITHEUM. Specification of BITHEUM coin Code Name: BITHEUM Ticker: BTH Algorithm: X11 Decimal place(s): 2 Type: proof-of-work (POW)/Smart Staking Block Time: 100 Seconds Block Reward: 50 BTH Smart Staking interest: 35% of Block Rewards Halving: 1.2M Blocks Difficulty Retarget: 10 Minutes Maximum Coin Supply: 41,000,000 Premined: 14,000,000  Other BITHEUM products The BITHEUM BlazePay Debit Card: The BITHEUM BlazePay card is fully integrated into the BITHEUM wallet, allowing users to be able to convert their BTH to their preferred supported currencies at a tiny conversion fee,  ( about 0.05% ) and spend them whenever and wherever they want with no restrictions whatsoever. Light, powerful and feature rich wallets: with the bitheum wallets, users can easily access and govern their funds the way the like, without worries of compromises, as its fully secured yet light. The wallets will include all features such as email send, instant shapeshift, crypto vault, mining and smart staking. BITHEUM ICO Information •   Total coins premined- 14000000 •   Total coins available for ICO- 12000000 •   Total ICO phase- four phases of ICO •   Total coin allocated per ICO phase-3000000 BTH •   Price of BITHEUM per ICO phase- varies •   Starting price of BITHEUM ICO- 1 BTC = 8000 BTH •   Accepted payment for purchase in ICO- Bitcoin •   Minimum ICO contribution- 0.01BTC •   ICO duration- 40 days •   ICO Starts - March 23rd •   ICO Ends - may 2nd  For BOUNTY information, please click here  Team information - included in the whitepaper and website Source code will be publish on github after crowdsale. Queries and questions can be directed here in the thread or by telegram. Click here to contact one of our representatives
